## Converter.mapItems() method

Creates a [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) which maps the individual items of a collection resulting from this [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) using the supplied map fuction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mapItems<TI>(mapper: (from: unknown) => Result<TI>): Converter<TI[], TC>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapper | (from: unknown) =&gt; [Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;TI&gt; | The map function to be applied to each element of the result of this [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TI\[\], TC&gt;

A new [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) returning `<TI[]>`<!-- -->.

## Remarks

Fails if `from` is not an array.
